entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 11:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -9.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: -11.0°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
